Name: Men's Goat Leather Jackets ALJ00309
ShortDescription: Possessing a unique and natural textured surface, Aristino goat leather jacket brings a strong, new look but ensures politeness and elegance for gentlemen.
Description: Possessing a unique and natural textured surface, Aristino goat leather jacket brings a strong, new look but ensures politeness and elegance for gentlemen. The shirt is designed in a Racer Jacket style, simple but delicate with a punch line only in the rib pocket. Goat leather is strong, thick, and has a porosity that feels soft, extremely comfortable to wear. Goat leather material with the advantages of soft, quite light and good heat retention will be the right choice for everyday wear.

Name: Men's Wind Jackets AJK004W9
ShortDescription: Regular Fit 2-layer jacket has just the right amount of looseness, helping the wearer to feel comfortable in every movement.
Description: The shirt is designed with a hat, has a drawstring at the bottom of the shirt, the sleeves are glued with a meticulous hem and can be adjusted to a tight width. 100% Polyester material, thin and light, glossy and sharp surface. Not to be missed is the ability to limit wrinkles and dust, helping you always be neat no matter what the situation. The shirt has the ability to block the wind, protecting the body from being dry in a short time under light rain.

Name: Men's Wind Jackets AJKG01W9
ShortDescription: Golf Fit jacket is suitable for golfers and active gentlemen.
Description: Impressive design with strong, masculine but still sophisticated cut lines. The shirt has a semi-circle elastic at the sleeves and a drawstring at the hem. Shirt with Aris Golf logo printed on the back and front of the chest, accented with 2 side slit pockets with reflective zipper details. The 5cm collar and mid-body zipper provide absolute convenience for the user. The shirt is lightweight, easy to fold and put in a pocket or car trunk when not in use.

Name: Men's Wind Jackets AJK014W9
ShortDescription: The Regular Fit double-layer jacket is suitable for many body shapes thanks to its loose fit, providing comfort and a snug fit.
Description: The winding stone veins printed on the black fabric give the shirt a mysterious but extremely attractive look. The shirt is designed with a 5cm high neckline, large sleeves and hem, keeping the wearer warm throughout the winter. Composition from 100% Polyester fiber, thin and light, shiny and sharp. At the same time, excellent resistance to wrinkles and dust. And that is the ability to block the wind, light water, protect the body, help you confidently under the light drizzle.

Name: Men's Wind Jackets AJK015W9
ShortDescription: Double-layer regular fit jacket, not tight to the body, comfortable but still enough to keep warm in the cold season.
Description: Checkered pattern shirt, sleeves and hem are sewn in a large version, extremely neat and strong. The design without a hat, 5cm collar, both helps keep the body warm and creates a masculine shirt form. In addition, the shirt has an extra zipper for the pocket to be extremely convenient. 100% Polyester fiber composition will bring the wearer the best experience. It is the thinness, sharpness, and smoothness on the fabric surface. Not to be missed is the excellent ability to limit wrinkles and dust, providing a neat appearance in any situation.

Name: Men's Wind Jackets AJK042W9
ShortDescription: Regular Fit 2-layer jacket is just enough but still fits your body measurements.
Description: With a youthful design with a boomber style, the baseball collar gives the wearer a look that is both classic and trendy. On the background of 2 neutral colors, gray and purple, the shirt is applied Emboss technology to create a glitter pattern that changes color continuously thanks to light effects. Using the composition is 100% Polyester fiber, the shirt is soft but still enough to keep the body warm. The surface of the fabric is smooth and durable, keeping the color over time.

Name: Men's Wind Jackets AJK002W9
ShortDescription: The jacket is windproof, dustproof and can be folded for convenient carrying.
Description: Single-layer Regular Fit windbreaker jacket, which is lightweight, ensures comfort in movement, suitable for many body shapes. The shirt uses a solid, waterproof fabric. Robust construction with a 5cm high collar and a convenient removable hood. The hem and sleeves are 1cm elastic to help block the wind, the shirt uses a modern, streamlined serrated buckle. High-quality polyester material is treated with modern technology for a durable, smooth fabric with a sharp shine. The shirt is easy to clean and easy to maintain, has light water resistance, wind resistance and limits dust accumulation. At the same time, the color is durable, keeping its shape after many washings.

Name: MEN'S JACKETS AJK007W9
ShortDescription: The regular Fit 1-layer wind jacket has a wide fit, making it comfortable for the wearer in every movement, but at the same time ensuring a snug fit in terms of shoulder measurements, sleeve length, and shirt.
Description: Meticulous design to every detail provides the best experience in cold weather with a specially constructed one-piece hat that hugs the head tightly when the elastic is drawn. Sleeveless raclang sleeves. The shirt has elastic at the hem of the shirt, the sleeves use a solid 1cm edge. The back of the shirt is designed with a sunken pocket, which easily folds into the back pocket. High quality 100% Polyester material makes the product durable, colorfast and has a natural shine. In particular, the fabric is light and airy, retains heat well, limits dust, and is easy to care for and maintain.

Name: JACKET AJK001W8
ShortDescription: Regular fit jacket is light and comfortable.
Description: Basic collar design with zipped chest pocket and two convenient crossbody pockets. Basic colors, suitable for all ages and easy to match outfits. Special sewing details on the front and back and along the sleeves create a strong and dynamic look. Combination of melange color effect gives men an impressive and attractive look. Polyester material makes the fabric durable, smooth and has a sharp shine. The shirt is easy to clean and easy to maintain, has light water resistance, wind resistance and limits dust accumulation. At the same time, the color is durable, keeping its shape after many washings.

Name: Men's Jacket AJK026W7
ShortDescription: Regular fit wind jacket is light and comfortable.
Description: Strong and striking design with a youthful color scheme makes the wearer more masculine. Warmer with a built-in hood with adjustable drawstrings, elastic hem and wide zip pockets. High-quality polyester material is treated with modern technology for a durable, smooth fabric with a sharp shine. The shirt is easy to clean and easy to maintain, has light water resistance, wind resistance and limits dust accumulation. At the same time, the color is durable, keeping its shape after many washings.

Name: Men's Jacket AJK034W7
ShortDescription: Aristino collar jacket with comfortable Regular fit form and basic design is a must-have item in men's wardrobe this fall and winter.
Description: The design is basic but not boring with bo rib accents at the collar and pockets, with masculine decorative clasps. Soft, breathable CVC fabric that still stands on the fish skin woven fabric creates thick and warm clothes. Super comfortable 4-way stretch shirt thanks to Spandex.

Name: Men's Jacket AJK027W9
ShortDescription: The Regular Fit 2-layer jacket has just the right length but at the same time still fits the body measurements of Vietnamese men.
Description: Bomber design, white wavy pattern on a purple-blue background. The shirt is designed with a strong baseball collar, strong woven bo rib neck and sleeves. The shirt uses silver metal buckles for both the body and the pockets to ensure durability and not rust over time, on the sleeves are sewn decorative pocket pockets. 100% Polyester gives the shirt light softness, smooth fabric, sharp colors and excellent body-warming ability.

Name: Men's Jacket AJK037W8
ShortDescription: Regular fit jacket is light, comfortable, and still fits your body measurements.
Description: Designed with a 6cm borib woven neckline for good warmth. Rib fabric hem and sleeves help limit jostling when exercising. The shirt has a front pocket and a convenient slit inside the chest. The simple decorative seams bring a masculine and equally impressive beauty. Basic colors, suitable for all ages and easy to match outfits. Rayon material makes the surface soft, light, comfortable. Combined with Nylon, the surface is shiny, smooth, sharp, anti-wrinkle, anti-wrinkle, helps prevent wind, keep warm, and has good moisture resistance and prevents mold. The shirt has a certain amount of stretch thanks to the 5% spandex combination

Name: Men's Wind Jackets AJK018W8
ShortDescription: Regular fit 2-layer jacket is comfortable, not picky.
Description: Dynamic design, strong with the highlight is special sewing details along the shoulders. The hem of the shirt is light on the sides, the collar keeps warm, and the mesh inside helps prevent the cold wind from outside while still being breathable and moisture-free. The shirt has 2 side zip pockets and convenient slit pocket inside the chest. High quality polyester material makes the product durable, colorfast and has a natural shine. The fabric is light, airy, and retains heat well, limiting dust, easy to care for and preserve.

Name: Men's jackets AJK012W8
ShortDescription: Regular fit premium feather jacket with a comfortable fit.
Description: A completely new, neater design with delicate light lines sewn inside the hem enhances the masculine figure of the wearer. The shirt is super light but has the ability to keep warm very well thanks to the feather material, which is the perfect choice for men on cold winter days. 100% nylon fabric makes the surface shiny, smooth, sharp, anti-wrinkle, anti-wrinkle, helps prevent wind and keep the body warm. The inner layer of feathers is soft, warm, and retains heat well.

ShortDescription: Charming Fuchsia Pink Power Shoulders Tulip Hem Wrap Dress

Charming fuchsia pink. Knitted wrap dress. V-neck. Short sleeves. Stylish tulip hem. Above knee length. Polyester, machine wash

Name: U.S. Polo Assn.
ShortDescription: Men Blue Colourblocked

It's cut from beautifully soft cotton and features a round neck, long sleeves with ribbed cuffs and a ribbed hemline. Wear this anything from jeans to trousers.

Name: HIGHLANDER
ShortDescription: Men White Solid Sneakers

Name: ADIDAS
ShortDescription: Men White & Navy Leather CAFLAIRE Sneakers
Description: Sleek, slim style that goes with everything, these low top tennis-inspired Sneakers are made of premium leather with super-soft suede overlays for a luxurious feel. Smooth waxed laces give the Sneakers a sophisticated look

Name: PU Sneaker (Red Tape)
ShortDescription: Men Black Colourblocked PU Sneakers
Description: A pair of round toe black sneakers ,has regular styling,. Lace-ups detail. Pu upper. Cushioned footbed. Textured and patterned outsole. Warranty: 3 months

Name: Nike
ShortDescription: Men White Solid WEARALLDAY Sneakers
Description: What would it feel like to lace a pair of clouds to your feet? You'll never know, but we think the Nike Wearallday is pretty close. Featuring plush padding around the ankle, a thick, downy tongue and unbelievably soft foam underfoot, this sport-inspired shoe is the embodiment of comfort. Mesh on the upper adds breathability that lasts, while the rubber Waffle outsole gives you traction every day.

Name: Puma
ShortDescription: Men Black Sneakers
Description: A pair of round-toe black sneakers, has regular styling, lace-up detail. Mesh upper. Cushioned footbed. Textured and patterned outsole. Warranty: 3 months. Warranty provided by brand/manufacturer

Name: H&M Sneaker
ShortDescription: Mens White Hi-top trainers
Description: Hi-top trainers in sturdy cotton canvas with a print motif, eyelets in the sides and a tongue and lacing at the front. Linings and insoles in cotton canvas and rubber soles that are patterned underneath. Height of soles 3 cm.

Name: HRX
ShortDescription: Men White & Grey Colourblocked Chunky Sneakers
Description: Product Description: Make a striking style statement with the HRX Chunky Sneaker. Bring style to your Active Lifestyle with HRX's athleisure collection. Great combination of Design comfort & Active Fashion. Pair these with our HRX Athleisure apparel collection.

Name: FILA
ShortDescription: Men Black Colourblocked PU Mid-Top Sneakers
Description: A pair of round-toe black sneakers, has mid-top styling, lace-up detail. PU upper. Cushioned footbed. Textured and patterned outsole. Warranty: 3 months. Warranty provided by brand/manufacturer

Name: Provogue

Description: A pair of round-toe white & blue sneakers, has mid-top styling, lace-up detail. Textile upper. Cushioned footbed. Textured and patterned outsole. Warranty: 3 months. Warranty provided by brand/manufacturer

Name: Short-sleeved shirts ASS129S1
ShortDescription: Slim Fit short-sleeved shirt fits snugly but still comfortably moves.
Description: Basic design without comfortable chest pockets, fashion ruffles printed with green leaves to create accents. 50% Bamboo from natural bamboo fiber brings coolness, good absorption and creates a comfortable feeling. 50% Polyspun helps save maximum time for ironing thanks to its natural elasticity and less wrinkle during use.

Name: Short-sleeved shirts ASS038S1
ShortDescription: Perfect fit short-sleeved shirt for casual wear in an office environment with just the right length and the necessary width.
Description: The white plaid design with a gradient jacquard weave effect is a breath of fresh air for the office gentleman. The shirt is designed with short sleeves, with flaps for easy release. Modal material of natural beech fiber and polyester gives the fabric surface soft, cool, absorbent and sharp durable. Combined with 2% Spandex, the shirt has a slight stretch to help you feel comfortable in every movement.

Name: Short-sleeved shirts ASS177S1
ShortDescription: Slim Fit slim fit short-sleeved shirt.
Description: Shirt with ruched design, no chest pocket. Printed shirt with blue purple and white stripes gives the wearer an attractive look. 50% Modal made from natural beech fiber for a soft, light and breathable fabric surface. 50% Polyspun helps save maximum time for ironing thanks to its natural elasticity and less wrinkle during use.

Name: MEN'S LONG-Sleeve Shirt ALS13001
ShortDescription: Slim fit long-sleeve shirt hugs lightly and flatters the figure.
Description: The shirt has a ruched design, no chest pocket, printed with a unique light blue background. 38% Modal makes the fabric surface soft and absorbent. 24% Cotton offers light porosity, just right fit. 38 Polyester gives the shirt a sharp color and keeps the color over time.
